subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Thanks to the Edmonton Oilers' right wing Fernando Pisani, it was not the Oilers' last gasp and they will continue their attempt to become the second team to rally from a 3-1 series deficit to win the Cup.
snippet: Thanks to the Edmonton Oilers' right wing Fernando Pisani, it was not the Oilers' last gasp and they will continue their attempt to become the second team to rally from a 3-1 series deficit to win the Cup.
